languages.text: If an ally remains in combat after being attacked with the ability {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} and then kills an enemy while under the effect, they will regain 30% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost due to {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the ally who survived through {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} kills an enemy while the bonus effect is still active, they restore 30% of wounds lost by {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: If an ally remains in combat after an attack made while under the effect of {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g}, killing an enemy with the attack, they regain 30% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost due to {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

If an ally remains in combat after being attacked with the ability {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} and then kills an enemy while under the effect, they will regain 30% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost due to {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
When {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} is less than 100 points, killing the marked enemy or targeting an ally grants +{uip|Momentum|fa3d22a15b2d47cea26872abed3ad70f} momentum.

When {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is less than 100 points, At All Costs! grants +{uip|Momentum|fa3d22a15b2d47cea26872abed3ad70f} momentum upon killing the marked enemy or targeting an ally.

If an ally remains in combat after being attacked with the ability {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} and then kills an enemy while under the effect, they will regain 30% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost due to {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn ein Verbündeter im Kampf bleibt, nachdem er mit der Fähigkeit {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Um jeden Preis!{/g} attackiert wurde, und dann unter dem Einfluss des Effektes einen Gegner tötet, regeneriert er 30 % der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, die er durch {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Um jeden Preis!{/g} als {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} verloren hat.
languages.original_text: If an ally remains in combat after being attacked with the ability {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} and then kills an enemy while under the effect, they will regain 30% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost due to {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn die Dynamik weniger als 100 Punkte beträgt, gewährt das Töten des markierten Gegners oder das Anvisieren eines Verbündeten +{uip|Momentum|fa3d22a15b2d47cea26872abed3ad70f} Dynamik.
Wenn die Dynamik weniger als 100 Punkte beträgt, gewährt das Töten des markierten Gegners oder das Anvisieren eines Verbündeten +<u>(20 + 2 × GEF-Bonus)</u> Dynamik.

languages.text: Si un allié sous l'effet de {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Coûte que coûte !{/g} tue un ennemi, 30 % des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} qu'il a perdues à cause de {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Coûte que coûte !{/g} sont restaurées en tant que {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
languages.original_text: If an ally remains in combat after being attacked with the ability {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} and then kills an enemy while under the effect, they will regain 30% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost due to {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si un allié sous l'effet de {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Coûte que coûte !{/g} tue un ennemi, 30 % des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} qu'il a perdues à cause de {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Coûte que coûte !{/g} sont restaurées en tant que {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
Lorsque la fougue est inférieure à 100 points, le fait d'éliminer l'ennemi désigné ou de cibler un allié confère +{uip|Momentum|fa3d22a15b2d47cea26872abed3ad70f} de fougue.

languages.text: 如果盟友被{g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}排除万难！{/g}能力击中后依然保持战斗状态，且在能力效果影响期间击杀敌人，则该名盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}{/g}{g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}排除万难！{/g}能力造成伤害的30%。
languages.original_text: If an ally remains in combat after being attacked with the ability {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} and then kills an enemy while under the effect, they will regain 30% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost due to {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 如果盟友被{g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}排除万难！{/g}能力击中后依然保持战斗状态，且在能力效果影响期间击杀敌人，则该名盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}{/g}{g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}排除万难！{/g}能力造成伤害的30%。
当士气低于100点时，击杀被标记的敌人或以盟友为目标时，可获得+{uip|Momentum|fa3d22a15b2d47cea26872abed3ad70f}点士气。

languages.text: Si un aliado sigue en el combate después de ser atacado con la capacidad {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}¡A cualquier precio!{/g} y mata a un enemigo estando bajo sus efectos, recuperará como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} un 30 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} que perdiese a consecuencia de {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}¡A cualquier precio!{/g}.
languages.original_text: If an ally remains in combat after being attacked with the ability {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} and then kills an enemy while under the effect, they will regain 30% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost due to {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si un aliado sigue en el combate después de ser atacado con la capacidad {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}¡A cualquier precio!{/g} y mata a un enemigo estando bajo sus efectos, recuperará como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} un 30 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} que perdiese a consecuencia de {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}¡A cualquier precio!{/g}.
Cuando el ímpetu es inferior a los 100 puntos, matar al objetivo marcado o elegir como objetivo a un aliado otorga +{uip|Momentum|fa3d22a15b2d47cea26872abed3ad70f} de ímpetu.

Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} es inferior a los 100 puntos, ¡A cualquier precio! otorga +{uip|Momentum|fa3d22a15b2d47cea26872abed3ad70f} de ímpetu al matar al objetivo marcado o elegir como objetivo a un aliado.

languages.text: 味方が{g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}どんな犠牲を払っても！{/g}で攻撃された後も戦闘に残り、その効果下で敵を倒した場合、{g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}どんな犠牲を払っても！{/g}によって失った{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の30%を{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}として回復する。
languages.original_text: If an ally remains in combat after being attacked with the ability {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} and then kills an enemy while under the effect, they will regain 30% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost due to {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 推進力が100未満の時、マークした敵を倒すか味方をターゲットにすると、推進力が+<u>(20 + 2 × FELボーナス)</u>される。
推進力が100未満の時、マークした敵を倒すか味方をターゲットにすると、推進力が+{uip|Momentum|fa3d22a15b2d47cea26872abed3ad70f}される。

languages.text: Если союзник остается в строю после применения {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Задать им жару!{/g} и убивает врага под действием этого эффекта, то он восстанавливает 30% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, потерянного из-за способности {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Задать им жару!{/g} в виде {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: If an ally remains in combat after being attacked with the ability {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} and then kills an enemy while under the effect, they will regain 30% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost due to {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Если хотя бы один союзник остается в бою после применения атаки {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Задать им жару!{/g} и убивает врага под действием этого эффекта, то он восстанавливает 30% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, потерянного из-за эффекта {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Задать им жару!{/g} в виде {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
Если текущее значение моментума отряда меньше 100, убийство противника с меткой или выбор союзника в качестве цели дает <u>(20 + 2 × бонус ОБЩ)</u> моментума.
Если текущее значение моментума отряда меньше 100, убийство противника с меткой или выбор союзника в качестве цели дает {uip|Momentum|fa3d22a15b2d47cea26872abed3ad70f} моментума.

Если хотя бы один союзник остается в бою после применения атаки {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Задать им жару!{/g} и убивает врага под действием этого эффекта, то он восстанавливает 30% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, потерянного из-за эффекта {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Задать им жару!{/g} в виде {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

Если союзник остается в строю после применения {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Задать им жару!{/g} и убивает врага под действием этого эффекта, то он восстанавливает 30% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, потерянного из-за способности {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Задать им жару!{/g} в виде {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: Bir dost birim, {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Canın Pahasına!{/g} kabiliyeti ile saldırıya uğradıktan sonra çatışmada kalırsa ve ardından bu etki altındayken bir düşmanı öldürürse {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Canın Pahasına!{/g} yüzünden kaybettiği {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %30'unu {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı olarak geri kazanır.
languages.original_text: If an ally remains in combat after being attacked with the ability {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} and then kills an enemy while under the effect, they will regain 30% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost due to {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bir dost birim, {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Canın Pahasına!{/g} kabiliyeti ile saldırıya uğradıktan sonra çatışmada kalırsa ve ardından bu etki altındayken bir düşmanı öldürürse {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}Canın Pahasına!{/g} yüzünden kaybettiği {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %30'unu {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı olarak geri kazanır.

languages.text: If the ally who survived through {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} kills an enemy while the bonus effect is still active, they restore 30% of wounds lost by {g|f:cce96eda109f4431941cb5c240040657}At All Costs!{/g} as temporary wounds.
